about_the_game:
Overview

The story of a girl trapped in the infinite layers of a shrine. A 3D horror adventure where you search for a clue to escape in a sacred area colored by past tragedies.

Game Description

A girl wakes up in a shrine at dusk and finds out that it is a shrine of another world with infinite layers. In the sacred area where time is distorted, she meets the soul of a shrine maiden who has become a monster, and gets closer to the truth of her sadness.

This is a first-person perspective 3D horror adventure game set in a Japanese shrine. Players will explore the infinite layers of the shrine and unravel the story hidden in the place.

Game Features (tentative)

■ Infinite Shrine Exploration

Freely explore the infinite levels of the shrine

Witness the shrine from different eras on each level

Mapping system records the complex structure

■ A game of chase with monsters

Frontal combat is impossible

Hide, run, and sometimes avoid eye contact

Flashlight light is your lifeline

■ Photos and clues

Mysterious phenomena captured on camera

Notes and records left on each level

Collect mysteries scattered across multiple eras

■ Psychological puzzle solving

The source of the sadness of the shrine maiden who became a monster

The truth behind the ritual hidden in the shrine

The whereabouts of the missing girls

Setting of the story

A girl who visited a shrine rumored to grant wishes suddenly finds herself in a mysterious shrine with infinite levels. It is a place where "time" is distorted. The higher you go, the further you are into the future, and the lower you go, the further you are into the past. (tentative)

The soul of a shrine maiden who has become a monster wanders the shrine. The source of her sadness is connected to the truth behind a certain ritual that took place over 100 years ago. Players will explore the shrine, escape from the monster, and unravel the truth of what happened at the shrine.

Multiple endings planned.
